trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Selma
There were no other sightings in Selma on or around March 6th 2012
Summary: I know exactly what smoke looks like this was not smoke.
divs: Sighting DetailsJust walked out the house and looked up at the sky was watching the two stars that were aligned adjacently then kinda buzzed out and smoke materializes out of thin air but it was snakelike in its movement just a long trail of smoke twirling and moving south at same time after the twirls it spread out like a flock of birds and left my sight. All i could say was wtf this may not have been ufo but wtf it was fling and i dont know what it was. This really freaked me out. Ive never saw anything like this in even in movies.
